text: Hello I have the same issue in these days. I'm pretty new in HubSpot, I contact the support but nobody can help me i cannot reach tecnical support. Where I can contact someone on the HubSpot technical support team?
any reason why a POST to a serverless function endpoint using the sandbox domain in content staging would return a 500 error? the GET endpoint requests using the domain work fine?

well solved part of my problem. the endpoint returns a form definition. However forms API is returning 403 for the given form id. think it might be a scope issue. it works for one form but not another and works for one auth token but not another
```{
  "status": "error",
  "message": "User cannot access this form",
  "correlationId": "46266642-0fce-4243-8d6b-704269dc18e1",
  "category": "INTERNAL_ERROR"
}```
